directions: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir onion in hot oil until translucent, 5 to 7 minutes. Break ground turkey into small pieces and add to skillet; cook and stir, breaking turkey further into smaller pieces, until completely browned, 7 to 10 minutes.
Stir ketchup, vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, Dijon mustard, brown sugar, and chili powder into the turkey; cook at a simmer until hot and thick, about 10 minutes.
title: Turkey Joes
